Text: E-Eep...! Wh-What do you want...?!

M-Money? I-If it's money you're after, my family are
aristocrats—
DIEEEEEEEEE!!!

Mundane Mann. A 22-year-old artistocrat from the
Altena Empire.

A lazy and mediocre swordsman, he was disowned
5 years ago. Since then, he has wandered from place
to place as a mercenary and bodyguard.

His final job is guarding a wagon carrying the
possessed.

But his only sin was being lazy. He guarded the
possessed carriage without knowing any better.
He was simply unlucky.
...He had big dreams that nobody else knew about.
But they ended as nothing more than that—just dreams.
Aaaahh...
Hmph... What a weakling!

*yawn* I've got bigger fish to fry! Like those
Tempura guys!
...Hey! You there!
Y-Yes!
You and Lambda are enough to handle these guys!

I'm going after the Tempura. You hunt down all these
losers!
What?!
Hrrraaaaah!!!
Understood...!

(Lady Delta...! She must've perceived that No. 111
might hesitate when fighting her former comrades.)

(She's deliberately sending her into the fray, making
her feel the weight of her position as a Garden
soldier.)

(This must be the Shadow Wisdom: "Spare the rod,
spoil the child"!)
You heard her, No. 111!

I'll handle the rescue and protection of the
possessed! You take care of all the surrounding
cult soldiers!
...Understood!
You soldiers aren't even Children!

(I have fewer qualms than I anticipated about killing
Cult of Diablos members.)

(...Did I...always know deep down that I was living
my life in the wrong?)

(Had I realized that the peace upheld by the Cult's
influence was a hollow serenity built on lies?)

Am I...living so recklessly now...because I feel the
need to atone?!
Sh-She's...strong!

Close in on her! We'll counter the range of her
spear—
Not happening!
Aghh...!
Aaaagghh!
Whatever happens...I can't...die here!
